import re

    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(device|computer|machine|equipment|hardware|input|output)\b'

```python
import re

def extract_entities(text):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(software|system)\b', text, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Software System'] = [f"the {system}" for system in software_systems]

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b(a|an)\s+(device)\b', text, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [f"the {device}" for device in physical_devices]

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(designer|client|scientist|engineer|individual|patient|sun|old)\b', text, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [f"the {object}" for object in environment_objects]

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b(a|an)\s+(database|card|tap|disk)\b', text, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['External System'] = [f"the {system}" for system in external_systems]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b(requirement|requirements)\b', text, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b(detail|information|data|event|state|value)\b', text, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities

# Test the function
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) system'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) device'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) object'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) system'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) to ([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) and ([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("It is the primary interface by which the correlator is configured, operated, and serviced."))
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*shall\s*(have|be|provide|allow|enable|support|contain|include|use|utilize|employ|make|make\sto|make\sto\s*)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[0])

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(is|are|has|have|can|could|may|might|shall|will|would)\s*(a|an|the)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match[3])

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(is|are|has|have|can|could|may|might|shall|will|would)\s*(an|the)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match[3])

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(is|are|has|have|can|could|may|might|shall|will|would)\s*(a|an|the)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match[3])

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(shall|will|would|can|could|may|might)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match[2])

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(shall|will|would|can|could|may|might)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match[2])

    return json.dumps(entities)
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'The\s*(\w+)\s*Control\s*System'
    match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['Software System'].append(match.group(1))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'an?\s*(\w+?)\s*printer'
    match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match.group(1))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'an?\s*(\w+?)\s*Operator'
    match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match.group(1))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'C4I\s*Messages|Mission\s*Plans|FD/L\s*information|current\s*map\s*display'
    match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['External System'].append(match.group(0))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'perform\s*limited\s*amounts\s*of\s*real-time\s*data\s*processing|providing\s*tools\s*to\s*collect\s*and\s*display\s*auto\s*correlation\s*products'
    match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match.group(0))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'auto\s*correlation\s*products|real-time\s*data\s*processing'
    match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match.group(0))

    return json.dumps(entities)
```

```python
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(1))
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System)', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+s?|AVs?|AV|AVs)', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|payload|the [A-Z][a-z]+)', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|interface|database|tap|hard disk|ETRAC|AFMSS|AFATDS|ASAS|local area network|external interfaces|data links|AV subsystems)', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'(shall have the capability to|shall provide the capability to|shall support|shall allow for|shall be capable of|shall have the functionality necessary to|shall provide the necessary hardware and software functionality to|to allow the Tactical Control System to integrate with|to receive, process, and disseminate video and telemetry data from the AV and payload|to perform mission planning|to monitor and control the payload|to monitor and control the AV|to monitor and control the data links|to control and monitor the AV payload\(s\)|to monitor the status of all AV subsystems reporting status)', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'(line-of-sight|integrate with ETRAC|integrate with AFMSS|integrate with AFATDS|integrate with ASAS)', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("The Correlator Monitor and Control System exists as an integrated part of the overall VLA Expansion Project Monitor and Control Structure."))
```
## Explanation
The code uses regular expressions to extract entities from the input sentence. The regular expressions are designed to match the different types of entities as defined in the schema. The extracted entities are then stored in a dictionary and returned as a JSON string.

The regular expressions used are:

* Software System: `[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System`
* Physical Device: `[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+s?|AVs?|AV|AVs`
* Environment Object: `[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|payload|the [A-Z][a-z]+`
* External System: `[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|interface|database|tap|hard disk|ETRAC|AFMSS|AFATDS|ASAS|local area network|external interfaces|data links|AV subsystems`

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?System"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"the\s+hardware\s+of\s+the\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?System"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"the\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?environment"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"a\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?system"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"to\s+be\s+capable\s+of\s+being\s+scaled\s+as\s+well\s+as\s+being\s+modular"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"to\s+meet\s+the\s+varying\s+needs\s+of\s+the\s+Services"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return json.dumps(entities)

```python
        'Physical Device': r'\b(A device|A physical device|The device|The physical device|The [A-Z][a-z]+ device|The [A-Z][a-z]+ physical device|A [A-Z][a-z]+ device|A [A-Z][a-z]+ physical device)\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b(A environment|A object|The environment|The object|The [A-Z][a-z]+ environment|The [A-Z][a-z]+ object|A [A-Z][a-z]+ environment|A [A-Z][a-z]+ object)\b',

        'System Requirements': r'\b(A requirement|A system requirement|The requirement|The system requirement|The [A-Z][a-z]+ requirement|The [A-Z][a-z]+ system requirement|A [A-Z][a-z]+ requirement|A [A-Z][a-z]+ system requirement)\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b(A phenomenon|A shared phenomenon|The phenomenon|The shared phenomenon|The [A-Z][a-z]+ phenomenon|The [A-Z][a-z]+ shared phenomenon|A [A-Z][a-z]+ phenomenon|A [A-Z][a-z]+ shared phenomenon)\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():

        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Return the result as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)
```

```python
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
``` 

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) system'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) device'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) system'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'(to|shall|should|must) ([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match[1] for match in system_requirements_matches]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) (data|information|communication|signals)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [match[0] for match in shared_phenomena_matches]

    return json.dumps(entities)
```

```python
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"the\s+hardware|the\s+device|the\s+peripheral|the\s+controller|the\s+server|the\s+tools|the\s+sensors"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"the\s+user|the\s+operator|the\s+patient|the\s+old|the\s+sun"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"the\s+database|the\s+magnetic\s+stripe\s+card|the\s+tap|the\s+hard\s+disk|the\s+traffic\s+management\s+systems"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"to\s+meet\s+the\s+voting\s+requirements|to\s+eliminate\s+as\s+well\s+as\s+control|to\s+establish\s+and\s+subsequently\s+terminate|to\s+have\s+a\s+n-tier\s+architecture|to\s+add\s+additional\s+storage|to\s+minimize\s+user\s+errors|to\s+minimize\s+the\s+cost|to\s+work\s+even\s+in\s+an\s+offline\s+mode"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"the\s+voting\s+requirements|the\s+potential\s+hazards|the\s+potential\s+user\s+errors|the\s+effort\s+needed|the\s+growth\s+requirements|the\s+adding\s+additional\s+storage"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return json.dumps(entities)
``` 

    }

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-zA-Z0-9\s]+)\s+shall\s+be\s+implemented\s+using\s+[A-Za-z0-9\s]+'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(1))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+shall\s+be\s+configured\s+to\s+execute\s+on\s+a\s+public\s+network'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(1))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+shall\s+be\s+configured\s+to\s+execute\s+on\s+a\s+public\s+network'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(1))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+shall\s+be\s+configured\s+to\s+execute\s+on\s+a\s+public\s+network'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(1))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+shall\s+be\s+configured\s+to\s+execute\s+on\s+a\s+public\s+network'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(1))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+shall\s+be\s+configured\s+to\s+execute\s+on\s+a\s+public\s+network'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(1))

    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function
```

        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

```python
    software_system_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w+|\w+)"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(computer\s*workstation|Human\s*Computer\s*Interface|power\s*switch\s*device)"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(the\s*\w+|a\s*\w+)"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(database|magnetic\s*stripe\s*card|tap|hard\s*disk)"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"(perform\s*software\s*debug\s*and\s*monitoring|perform\s*software\s*upgrades|executing\s*payload\s*maintenance\s*software|executing\s*workstation\s*and\s*peripheral\s*equipment\s*maintenance\s*software|displaying\s*appropriate\s*status\s*results|resume\s*in\s*the\s*same\s*mode\s*and\s*data|resume\s*in\s*the\s*same\s*mode\s*but\s*review\s*and\s*modify\s*the\s*command\s*data\s*as\s*necessary|perform\s*a\s*command\s*shutdown\s*and\s*startup\s*via\s*the\s*normal)"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(system\s*data|configuration|default\s*parameter\s*settings|planning|usage\s*data|the\s*state|the\s*type\s*of\s*recovery|the\s*state)"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return json.dumps(entities)
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(\w+)\s+system"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(1))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(\w+)\s+workstation|(\w+)\s+interface|(\w+)\s+device|(\w+)\s+hardware"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(1))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(\w+)\s+workstation|(\w+)\s+system|(\w+)\s+node|(\w+)\s+mode"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(1))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(\w+)\s+system|(\w+)\s+database|(\w+)\s+card|(\w+)\s+disk"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(1))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"(\w+)\s+shall\s+(.*)"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(2))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(\w+)\s+data|(\w+)\s+information|(\w+)\s+messages|(\w+)\s+results"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(1))

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System)', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'(shall|will|can) ([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)', sentence)
    system_requirements += re.findall(r'(shall|will|can) ([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)', sentence)
    system_requirements += re.findall(r'(shall|will|can) ([A-Z][a-z]+)', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [req[1] for req in system_requirements]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b(Tactical Control System|The Tactical Control System|the Tactical Control System|DigitalHome System|CCTNS system|the CCTNS system|the software|Correlator Power Control Computer)\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b(computer hardware|computers|peripherals|equipment|Correlator Power Control Computer|Human Computer Interface|workstation|computer workstation|tap|hard disk|magnetic stripe card|data link terminal|AV|payload)\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b(user|unwanted windows|building blocks|the patient|the sun|the old|workstation|computer workstation|another)\b',
        'External System': r'\b(These requirements|These building blocks|database|hard disk|magnetic stripe card|tap|computer software|computer communication|external system)\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b(perform fault detection/location|perform software debug and monitoring|perform software upgrades|conduct workstation and peripheral equipment maintenance|conduct data link terminal maintenance|conduct AV maintenance|conduct payload maintenance|allow for long range communications|data storage expansion|access to other computers to share in processing capability|multiple external peripherals|be utilized in a number of configurations|for closing unwanted windows|restore system data|close unwanted windows|TBD)\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b(system data|configuration|default parameter settings|planning|usage data|user actions|the configuration parameters)\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Iterate over the schema
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Return the result as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("Due to the more hardware specific connections and controls of the Correlator Power Control Computer, actions taken by external system upon hard failures are TBD."))
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(?:the\s+)?([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+system"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"the\s+(?:the\s+)?([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+device"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"the\s+(?:the\s+)?([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"the\s+(?:the\s+)?([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+system"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"the\s+(?:the\s+)?([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("All use of the Correlator Monitor and Control System will be through the VCI or Master Correlator Control Computer."))
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b(Tactical Control System|The Tactical Control System)\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b(UAV|AV|C4I interfaces)\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b(operator|primary contact|data terminal|the old|the sun|the patient)\b',
        'External System': r'\b(array operations|Monitor and Control System|database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk|data link|payload maintenance software)\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b(receive, process, and present status data to the operator so that the status of the data terminal and the supported AV data link can be monitored|monitoring and displaying the signal strength of the received and transmitted signals for the selected data terminal|to view incoming and outgoing, both annotated and un-annotated digital imagery messages|receive, process, and present payload data to the operator so that the status of the payload can be determined|monitoring and displaying the signal quality of the received and transmitted signals for the selected data terminal|provide override of payload automated as well as preprogrammed inputs|receipt and transmission of secondary imagery and/or data from UAV|receipt and transmission of secondary imagery and/or data from multiple UAV|provide the capability to monitor AV adherence to the uplinked mission plan, detecting any deviations greater than 10% from projected flight path, and notifying the operator if deviations are detected|present sufficient cues to the operator to implement and monitor automatic launch and recovery, and to initiate abort procedures if required|control and monitor an AV, payload, data link, and C4I interfaces during the execution of a mission|given appropriate warning messages|executing payload maintenance software and displaying appropriate status results|monitor payload adherence to the uplinked mission plan|provide the operator a cautions and warnings when the UAV system has identified a malfunction|to conduct mission control and monitoring)\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b(status data|signal strength|view incoming and outgoing, both annotated and un-annotated digital imagery messages|payload data|signal quality|override of payload automated as well as preprogrammed inputs|secondary imagery|data|cues|mission execution|appropriate status results|deviations|malfunction|cautions and warnings|mission control and monitoring)\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, value in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(value, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    result_json = json.dumps(result)

    return result_json

# Test the function
sentence = "The primary contact with array operations will be via status and error messages channeled through the Monitor and Control System."
print(extract_entities(sentence))
```

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+\s+software"
    if re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Software System'].append(re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence).group())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"a\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+"
    physical_device_pattern2 = r"[A-Z][a-z]+"
    physical_devices = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)

    external_system_pattern = r"a\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+\s+system"

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Return the result as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("A few authorized individuals may be allowed access to parts of the EVLA Correlator Monitor and Control System that are usually considered restricted."))
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(?:\w+\s+){0,2}\w+\s+system\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match.strip() for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(?:the|a|an)\s+(?:\w+\s+){0,2}\w+\s+device\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match.strip() for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(?:the|a|an)\s+(?:\w+\s+){0,2}\w+\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match.strip() for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(?:the|a|an)\s+(?:\w+\s+){0,2}\w+\s+archive|database|card|disk|link\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match.strip() for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(?:to|for|in|with|from|at|on|by|with|without)\s+(?:the|a|an)\s+(?:\w+\s+){0,2}\w+\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match.strip() for match in system_requirements_matches]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(?:the|a|an)\s+(?:\w+\s+){0,2}\w+\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [match.strip() for match in shared_phenomena_matches]

    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("If it is unavailable, incoming astronomical data will be lost."))
``` 

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?System"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match.strip() for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"a\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?device"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match.strip() for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"the\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?object"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match.strip() for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"a\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?system"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match.strip() for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall\s+have\s+.*\s+to\s+.*"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match.strip() for match in system_requirements_matches]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"shared\s+.*"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [match.strip() for match in shared_phenomena_matches]

    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("It is assumed that the backend data processing and VLA Expansion Project Monitor and Control System systems will be capable of accepting output data rates generated by the Correlator Monitor and Control System."))
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [system.strip() for system in software_systems]

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [device.strip() for device in physical_devices]

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [object.strip() for object in environment_objects]

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [system.strip() for system in external_systems]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ to [A-Z][a-z]+)', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [requirement.strip() for requirement in system_requirements]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [phenomenon.strip() for phenomenon in shared_phenomena]

    return json.dumps(entities)
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) shall'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) device'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) contact'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) networks'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) to meet'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) signals'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return json.dumps(entities)
```

```python
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System

    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'(shall|should|will) ([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [f'{req[1]} {req[0]}' for req in system_requirements]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return json.dumps(entities)
```

```python
    if re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Environment Object'] = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'(This interface|a database|a magnetic stripe card|a tap|hard disk|the existing system)'
    if re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence):

    if re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence):

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'(device control command|network identifier|dynamic lane identifier|username|password|lane plan|device control information|traffic data|traffic signal plan identifier|wireless communications|information for command timeframe request|device type|the evolving ITS Traffic Management Data Dictionary \(TMDD\) standard|the message sets associated with TMDD|other ITS Data Elements|Message Sets|The data)'
    if re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Shared Phenomena'] = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)

    return entities
```

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System)', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ Device)', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System)', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'(shall|must|should|can) ([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)', sentence)
    system_requirements = [f'{req[1]} {req[0]}' for req in system_requirements]
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return json.dumps(entities)

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) system', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [s.strip() for s in software_systems]

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) device', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [d.strip() for d in physical_devices]

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) object', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [o.strip() for o in environment_objects]

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) system', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [s.strip() for s in external_systems]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'shall\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [r.strip() for r in system_requirements]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) state', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [p.strip() for p in shared_phenomena]

    return json.dumps(entities)
```

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema

        'Software System': r'\bThe\s+system\b|\bA\s+DigitalHome\s+system\b|\bTactical\s+Control\s+System\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\bpower\s+switch\b|\bcoffee\s+maker\b|\bhumdistat\s+device\b|\bthermostat\s+unit\b|\bair\s+vehicle\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\buser\b|\bLOL\s+timer\b|\boperator\b|\blights\b',
        'External System': r'\bcritical\s+mission\s+data\b|\blight\s+alarm\s+subsystem\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\bmonitor\s+the\s+current\s+state\s+of\s+an\s+appliance\b|\bchange\s+the\s+state\s+of\s+the\s+appliance\b|\brestore\s+power\s+in\s+sufficient\s+time\b|\bdisplay\s+a\s+LOL\s+timer\s+to\s+the\s+operator\b|\bset\s+the\s+LOL\s+delay\s+timer\(s\)\s+during\s+mission\s+planning\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\bthe\s+current\s+state\s+of\s+an\s+appliance\b|\bthe\s+state\b|\bwireless\s+signals\b|\ba\s+power\s+outage\b|\btime\s+remaining\s+on\s+backup\s+power\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)

```python
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system)', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return json.dumps(entities)
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+\s+system"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"the\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+\s+CPU"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"the\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"a\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+\s+system"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"should\s+result\s+in\s+minimal\s+system\s+interruptions"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"reconfiguring\s+and\s+returning\s+to\s+service"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return json.dumps(entities)
``` 

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) software', sentence)
    entities['Software System'].extend(software_systems)

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) hardware', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'].extend(physical_devices)

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) (operator|system|mode|network|interface|data|information|equipment|payload|AV|UAV|computer|workstation|GUI|interface|data|information|equipment|payload|AV|UAV|computer|workstation|GUI)', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'].extend(environment_objects)

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) (system|module|operating system|operating systems|interface|data|information|equipment|payload|AV|UAV|computer|workstation|GUI|interface|data|information|equipment|payload|AV|UAV|computer|workstation|GUI)', sentence)
    entities['External System'].extend(external_systems)

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) (shall|should|will|can|be capable of|support|perform|allow|enable|provide|transmit|receive|process|disseminate|monitor|control|access|upgrade|execute|design|generate|simulate|support|host|access|upgrade|execute|design|generate|simulate)', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'].extend(system_requirements)

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) (related communications|mission tasking|mission planning|mission execution|data receipt|data processing|data dissemination|equipment requests|real-time requirements|hardware monitor/control/diagnostics|standalone test bench operation|simulated control data generation|access and upgrade|support server/host services|standalone test bench operation|simulated control data generation|access and upgrade|support server/host services)', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'].extend(shared_phenomena)
``` 

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(\w+\s*\w*)\s*software"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(1))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*computer"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(1))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*operator"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(1))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*system"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(1))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall\s+have\s+all\s+required\s+(\w+\s*\w*)\s*installed"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(1))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*data"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(1))

    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("The Master Correlator Control Computer shall have all required disk and file system facilities installed locally such that the EVLA Correlator Monitor and Control System can boot and run in a stand-alone configuration."))
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(input_string):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b|\b\w+\sSystem\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\sdevice\b|\b\w+\scomputer\b|\b\w+\sinterface\b|\b\w+\shardware\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\sobject\b|\b\w+\sentity\b|\b\w+\sstate\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\ssystem\b|\b\w+\sdatabase\b|\b\w+\sfile\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\srequirement\b|\b\w+\sfunctionality\b|\b\w+\scharacteristic\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\sphenomenon\b|\b\w+\sevent\b|\b\w+\sstate\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for entity_type, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, input_string)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[entity_type] = matches

    # Return the result as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)

# Test the function

print(extract_entities(input_string))
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(requirement):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'The\s*Tactical\s*Control\s*System'
    if re.search(software_system_pattern, requirement):
        entities['Software System'].append('The Tactical Control System')

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'air\s*vehicle|AV|Human\s*Computer\s*Interface|equipment|uninterruptible\s*power\s*supply'
    for match in re.finditer(physical_device_pattern, requirement):
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match.group())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'computer\s*workstation|operator|the\s*Tactical\s*Control\s*System\s*operator'
    for match in re.finditer(environment_object_pattern, requirement):
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match.group())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'system\s*status|critical\s*mission\s*data'
    for match in re.finditer(external_system_pattern, requirement):
        entities['External System'].append(match.group())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'restoring\s*power\s*in\s*sufficient\s*time|perform\s*software\s*debug\s*and\s*monitoring|conduct\s*data\s*link\s*terminal\s*maintenance|perform\s*fault\s*detection\/location\s*\(FD\/L\)|conduct\s*workstation\s*and\s*peripheral\s*equipment\s*maintenance|conduct\s*payload\s*maintenance|conduct\s*AV\s*maintenance|notify\s*the\s*operator\s*when\s*AV\s*performance\s*parameters\s*are\s*out\s*of\s*limits|provide\s*the\s*capability\s*to\s*override\s*validation\s*faults|provide\s*the\s*capability\s*to\s*monitor\s*specific\s*telemetry\s*elements\s*real-time|record\s*all\s*telemetry\s*elements\s*for\s*futures\s*review\s*and\s*processing|perform\s*software\s*upgrades|support\s*a\s*concurrent\s*uplink\s*and\s*downlink|have\s*an\s*interface|allow\s*correlator\s*power\s*monitoring\s*and\s*control\s*to\s*continue'
    for match in re.finditer(system_requirements_pattern, requirement):
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match.group())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'restoring\s*power\s*in\s*sufficient\s*time|AV\s*performance\s*parameters|telemetry\s*elements|a\s*preset\s*system\s*parameter\s*goes\s*under\s*as\s*well\s*as\s*over\s*a\s*set\s*threshold'
    for match in re.finditer(shared_phenomena_pattern, requirement):
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match.group())

    return json.dumps(entities)
```

```python
def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(\w+)\s+system"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(1))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"the\s+(\w+)\s+hardware"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(1))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(\w+)"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(1))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(\w+)\s+system"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(1))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall\s+([a-zA-Z\s]+)"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(1))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(\w+)"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(1))

    return json.dumps(entities)
```

```python
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s(system|system\s|System|System\s)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s(requirement|requirement\s|Requirement|Requirement\s)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
```

```python
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[2] for match in physical_device_matches]

    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[2] for match in environment_object_matches]

    external_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(pages|database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk|Variable Message Formats)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match[2] for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(shall|should|must|can|will)\s+(automatically|correctly|clearly|appropriately|flagged|review|ensure|utilize|comply|monitoring|controlling|filter|filtered)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match[1] for match in system_requirements_matches]

    # Shared Phenomena

    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [match[0] for match in shared_phenomena_matches]

    return json.dumps(entities)
```

```python
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+shall\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [f'{match[0]} {match[1]}' for match in system_requirements_matches]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+messages'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+\s+system"
    if re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Software System'] = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"a\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+\s+device"
    if re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Physical Device'] = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"the\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+"
    if re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Environment Object'] = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"a\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+\s+system"
    if re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence):
        entities['External System'] = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall\s+be\s+provided\s+with\s+the\s+capability\s+to\s+([a-zA-Z\s,]+)"
    if re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence):
        entities['System Requirements'] = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"a\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+\s+identifier"
    if re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Shared Phenomena'] = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)

    return entities
```

```python
def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b(Software|System|System\ssoftware)\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b(computer|device|equipment|AV|UAV|workstation|peripheral|hardware)\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b(user|operator|patient|sun|old|payload|product|building|block|agency|service|system|project|monitor|control)\b',
        'External System': r'\b(database|card|tap|disk|interface|system|software|equipment|monitor|control|project|system|status|parameter|threshold|architecture|CSCI|CSC|CSU|JSIPS-N)\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b(require|need|shall|will|can|be|have|provide|support|meet|scale|execute|display|perform|receive|process|send|get|receive|display|perform|limited|exploit|automated|system|software|status|monitoring|alerting|goes|under|over|threshold|parameter|architecture|open|hosted|operating|supported|future|additional|capability|functionality|necessary|manage|handling|receiving|processing|displaying|performing|limited|exploit)\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b(communications|mission|tasking|planning|execution|data|receipt|processing|exploitation|dissemination|status|results|parameter|threshold|architecture|distributed|processing|open|hosted|operating|supported|future|additional|capability|functionality|necessary|manage|handling|receiving|processing|displaying|performing|limited|exploit|configuring|operation|agency|service|system|project|monitor|control)\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, value in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(value, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Return the result as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w+)(\s*software)?"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[0])

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w+)(\s*computer)?(\s*device)?"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match[0])

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w+)(\s*operator)?"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match[0])

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w+)(\s*interface)?(\s*system)?"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match[0])

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w+)(\s*shall)?(\s*must)?(\s*should)?(\s*can)?(\s*will)?(\s*provide)?(\s*allow)?(\s*enable)?(\s*give)?(\s*give\s*the)?(\s*give\s*the\s*ability\s*to)?"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match[0])

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w+)(\s*related)?(\s*communications)?(\s*tasking)?(\s*planning)?(\s*execution)?(\s*receipt)?(\s*processing)?(\s*dissemination)?"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match[0])

    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function
``` 

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'The\s*(\w+\s*\w*)\s*System'
    match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['Software System'].append(match.group(1))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(hardware|device|system)'
    match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match.group(1))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(operator|user|system)'
    match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match.group(1))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(system|database|card|disk)'
    match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['External System'].append(match.group(1))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'shall\s*(\w+\s*\w*)'
    match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match.group(1))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(or|and|of|with|in|on|at|by|from|to|as|is|has|have|had|will|would|shall|should|can|could|may|might|must|ought|shall|should|will|would)'
    match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match.group(1))

    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("It will be capable of detecting, reporting on and automatically taking action to remedy or lessen the impact of the following types of abnormal conditions: processor hardware failure, operating system hangs or crashes, temperature or voltage deviations, computational performance below minimum specifications, computational error rates above maximum specification, internal communications failures."))
```

```python
    }
```

```python
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"the\s+(?:\w+\s+){0,2}device"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"the\s+(?:\w+\s+){0,2}operator"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"the\s+(?:\w+\s+){0,2}database"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall\s+perform\s+indefinitely\s+without\s+complete\s+loss\s+of\s+service"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"the\s+shutdown\s+state"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return json.dumps(entities)
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*shall\s*(be|have|include|establish|terminate|capture|store|keep|provide|be\s*re-programmable|be\s*alterable|be\s*non-proprietary|be\s*unlimited|be\s*debuggable)"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[0])

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(get|send|receive|store|capture|delete|modify|alter|change|update|read|write)"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match[0])

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(have|be|get|send|receive|store|capture|delete|modify|alter|change|update|read|write)"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match[0])

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(store|capture|delete|modify|alter|change|update|read|write|be|have|include|establish|terminate|keep|provide|be\s*re-programmable|be\s*alterable|be\s*non-proprietary|be\s*unlimited|be\s*debuggable)"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match[0])

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(shall|must|should|can|be|have|include|establish|terminate|capture|store|keep|provide|be\s*re-programmable|be\s*alterable|be\s*non-proprietary|be\s*unlimited|be\s*debuggable)"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match[0])

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(shall|must|should|can|be|have|include|establish|terminate|capture|store|keep|provide|be\s*re-programmable|be\s*alterable|be\s*non-proprietary|be\s*unlimited|be\s*debuggable)"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match[0])

    return entities
```

```python
def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+shall\s+be'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+shall\s+be\s+alterable'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+shall\s+have'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+shall\s+be\s+re-programmable'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'shall\s+be\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s,]+)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'shall\s+cause\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s,]+)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return json.dumps(entities)
```

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ hardware)', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ to [A-Z][a-z]+)', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return json.dumps(entities)

```python
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[0])

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+hardware'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match[0])

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+shall\s+be\s+physically\s+protected'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match[0])

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+shall\s+be\s+interoperable\s+with\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match[1])

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'shall\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match[0])

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+shall\s+be\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match[1])

    return json.dumps(entities)
``` 

```python
    }
``` 

```python
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
```

```python
    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"a\s+([A-Z][a-z]+)\s+device|([A-Z][a-z]+)\s+device|([A-Z][a-z]+)"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match for match in physical_device_matches if match]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"the\s+([A-Z][a-z]+)|([A-Z][a-z]+)"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match for match in environment_object_matches if match]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"a\s+([A-Z][a-z]+)\s+system|([A-Z][a-z]+)\s+system|([A-Z][a-z]+)"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match for match in external_system_matches if match]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall\s+([a-zA-Z\s]+)"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)

    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [match[0] + ' ' + match[1] for match in shared_phenomena_matches if match]

    return json.dumps(entities)
```

```python
    entities['External System'] = external_systems
```
