import re
import json

def extract_entities(text):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) system'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, text)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) device'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, text)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, text)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) system'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, text)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'to\s([A-Za-z\s]+)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, text)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Za-z\s]+) and ([A-Za-z\s]+)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, text)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [match[0] + ' ' + match[1] for match in shared_phenomena_matches]

    return json.dumps(entities)

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system)'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(0))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ device)'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(0))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(0))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system)'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(0))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'(to support [A-Z][a-z]+ control in other centers)'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(0))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ identifier|username|password|plan|duration|message|status information|DMS name)'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'].extend(shared_phenomena_match)

    return json.dumps(entities)
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'(hot swappable devices and components|standard electrical power sources|airborne, and shipboard electrical power sources|standard DoD tactical (VHF, UHF, and UHF/VHF) radios|Mobile Subscriber Equipment|military and commercial satellite communications equipment|other media storage devices)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'(the ASPERA-3 Co-Is|the ASPERA-3 team|all user interfaces|all user|the DoD|APAF|authorized operators)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'(APAF|JSTARS GSM|software upgrades via CD-ROM)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'(Maximal practical use|to allow the Tactical Control System to integrate with JSTARS GSM|to allow the Tactical Control System to integrate with TES|to interface with equipment|meeting MEX mission goals and objectives|detailed context-sensitive help material)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'(Payload telemetry data|ASPERA-3 and MEX OA cleaned-up telemetry|ASPERA-3 and MEX OA telemetry|ASPERA-3 and MEX OA IDFS data|intermediate files|communication|integrate with TES)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("Maximal practical use of available hot swappable devices and components shall be made."))
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(The )?(CCTNS|DigitalHome|Tactical Control System|The Tactical Control System|the software)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(a|an|the) (printer|computer|device|system|interface|user interface|user interface rules|hardware|software|operating system|tap|hard disk|database|magnetic stripe card)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(the )?(user|users|patient|sun|old|client|technical designers|players|administrator|end user)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(a|an|the) (database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk|operational software|training software|computer operating systems)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(to provide a familiar and common look|to facilitate the updating and editing of questions|making the content easy to understand|hosted on a variety of computer operating systems|finding similar information at the same position|writing in a style that is easily readable and using practices that allow for minimal confusion)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(appropriate terminology|error messages|pages|document|content items|bullet points|short sentences|textual content|screen|style|practices|confusion|transition|engagement|learning experience|document versions|layout schemes|similar information|different pages|content modification|game's educational content|questions|system sequence|game's adaptability|longevity|educational settings|user interface rules|user interface|user interface guidelines|specialist software|special needs|user's tasks|information needs|user's engagement|user's learning experience)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

# Test the function
sentence = "Software shall be written in a style that is easily readable and using practices that allow for minimal confusion."
print(extract_entities(sentence))
``` 
